author: Neil Munro
title: HHS: Nearly 40 Migrant Children Test Positive for Coronavirus at Chicago Shelter
description: China's Wuhan virus has spread to almost 40 migrant youths and children who are being sheltered by the Department of Health and Human Services, according to news services.
content:
China’s Wuhan virus has spread to almost 40 migrant youths and children who are being sheltered by the Department of Health and Human Services, according to news services.
